name: Farfetch'd

passive.name: Improvised Warrior
passive.effect: TMs equipped to Farfetch'd that deal damage deal 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with one of their Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Tool Smash
attacks.effect: If Farfetch'd has a Tool attached to it (other than a berry), this attack does 20 more damage.

flavor: These Pokemon improvise weapons constantly. One time at Christmas one hit me with a tube of cardboard.
